import React,{ useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' export const CreateActivity = ()=>{ let $countries = useSelector((state)=>state.countries) let [act, setAct] = useState({ name:'', difficulty:'', duration:'', season:'', countries:[] }) let handleChange = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() if(e.target.name === 'create'){ console.log('create') setAct((prev)=>({ ...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) }else if(e.target.name === 'decline'){ console.log('decline') } // setAct({ // name:'', // difficulty:'', // duration:'', // season:'', // countries:[] // }) } return( <>
Activity create











{$countries.map((el)=>
{el.id}
)}



) }
